title: Still Twitching (19P3)
text:
Set:	Ages End
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Bearer must be a [Dwarven] companion. Bearer gains Hunter 2. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may transfer this condition to another [Dwarven] companion. At the end of each turn, if bearer did not win a skirmish this turn, discard this condition from play.
Rarity:	P
